00022 /**
00023  * @file   QuantMethodReport.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Mon Oct 24 12:09:42 2005
00026  * 
00027  * @brief  Class for reporting results of quantification methods.
00028  */
00029 #ifndef _QUANTMETHODREPORT_H_
00030 #define _QUANTMETHODREPORT_H_
00031 
00032 //
00033 #include "chipstream/AnalysisInfo.h"
00034 #include "chipstream/QuantMethod.h"
00035 #include "chipstream/TsvReport.h"
00036 //
00037 #include "util/Util.h"
00038 //
00039 #include <cstdlib>
00040 #include <iostream>
00041 //
00042 
00043 /**
00044  *   Class for reporting results of quantification methods. Current idea is that
00045  *   the quantification methods will have at least one matching reporter to form
00046  *   computation/report pairs.
00047  */
00048 class QuantMethodReport : public affx::TsvReport {
00049 
00050 public:
00051 
00052   /**
00053    * Virtual destructor for a virtual class.
00054    */
00055   virtual ~QuantMethodReport();
00056 
00057   /** 
00058    * Get set up for a run of reporting probesets. Often used to open file
00059    * streams and print headers to files etc.
00060    * 
00061    * @param qMethod - Quantification method to be used.
00062    * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00063    * 
00064    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00065    */
00066   virtual bool prepare(QuantMethod &qMethod, const IntensityMart &iMart) = 0;
00067 
00068   /** 
00069    * After every probeset computation this function is called an is an opportunity
00070    * to query the quantification method for results, residuals, etc.
00071    * 
00072    * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00073    * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00074    * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00075    * 
00076    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00077    */
00078   virtual bool report(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, 
00079                       QuantMethod &qMethod, 
00080                       const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00081                       std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00082                       PmAdjuster &pmAdjust) = 0;
00083 
00084   /** 
00085    * If a probeset fails to compute for whatever reason then this method is
00086    * called rather than the normal report call above. By default does nothing.
00087    * 
00088    * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00089    * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00090    * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00091    * 
00092    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00093    */
00094   virtual bool reportFailure(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, 
00095                              QuantMethod &qMethod,
00096                              const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00097                              std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00098                              PmAdjuster &pmAdjust);
00099 
00100 
00101   /** 
00102    * No more probesets will be processed, this is a chance to finish outputting
00103    * results and clean up.
00104    * 
00105    * @param qMethod - Quantification method that was used.
00106    * 
00107    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00108    */
00109   virtual bool finish(QuantMethod &qMethod) = 0;
00110     
00111   /** 
00112    * @brief Print a message out to the stream.
00113    * @param s - Message to be printed.
00114    * @param comment - prefix this with a comment character?
00115    */
00116   // virtual void out(const std::string &s, bool comment=false) {}
00117 
00118   /** 
00119    * @brief Print out a comment delimiter for separation.
00120    */
00121   // virtual void commentDelim() {}
00122 
00123   /** 
00124    * @brief Print out the header for reports.
00125    * @param s - List of column names (usually file names.)
00126    * @param timeStr - Time string.
00127    */
00128   // virtual void printHeader(const std::vector<std::string> &s, const std::string& timeStr) {}
00129 
00130   /** 
00131    * @brief Finish text header.
00132    */
00133   //virtual void finishTextHeader() {}
00134 
00135   virtual void addStdHeaders(QuantMethodReport *qReport,
00136                              const std::string& execGuid, 
00137                              const std::string& reportGuid,
00138                              const std::string& timeStr,
00139                              const std::string& commandLine,
00140                              const std::string& execVersion,
00141                              const AnalysisInfo& info);
00142 };
00143 
00144 #endif /* _QUANTMETHODREPORT_H_ */
